column1: (1) The judgement shall be written by the judge who heard the

column2: case and shall be dated and signed by him in open court at
the time of pronouncing it, and in the case where appeal lies
shall  contain  the  point  or  points  for  determination,  the
decision thereon, and the reasons for the decision.

column1: (2) It shall specify the offence if any of which and the section of

column2: punishment to which he is sentenced.
